functions.name: Get holders of an ERC20 token
functions.description: Returns all holders of a specific ERC20 token

args.name: Contract address
args.description: The address of the ERC20 token contract

args.name: Token decimals
args.description: The number of decimals of the ERC20 token contract

args.name: Network
args.description: The network name or ID of the ERC20. Available networks: mainnet, polygon. Default: mainnet

functions.name: Get holders of an ERC721 token
functions.description: Returns all holders of a specific NFT (ERC721 token) contract

args.name: contractAddress
args.description: The address of the NFT contract

args.name: Network
args.description: The network name or ID of the NFT. Available networks: mainnet, polygon. Default: mainnet

functions.name: Get holders of an ERC1155 token
functions.description: Returns all holders of a specific NFT (ERC1155 token) contract

args.name: contractAddress
args.description: The address of the NFT contract

args.name: Network
args.description: The network name or ID of the NFT. Available networks: mainnet, polygon. Default: mainnet

functions.name: Get holders of an ERC1155 token (by Token ID)
functions.description: Returns all holders of a specific NFT (ERC1155 token) contract

args.name: contractAddress
args.description: The address of the NFT contract

args.name: Network
args.description: The network name or ID of the NFT. Available networks: mainnet, polygon. Default: mainnet

args.name: Token ID
args.description: A specific tokenId to filter by
